card.name: Abomination
card.text: Whenever Abomination blocks or becomes blocked by a green or white creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Acid Rain
card.text: Destroy all Forests.

card.name: Active Volcano
card.text: Choose one - Destroy target blue permanent; or return target Island to its owner's hand.

card.name: Adun Oakenshield
card.text: {B}{R}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Adventurers' Guildhouse
card.text: Green legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures."

card.name: AErathi Berserker
card.text: Rampage 3

card.name: Aisling Leprechaun
card.text: Whenever Aisling Leprechaun blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature becomes green.

card.name: Akron Legionnaire
card.text: Except for creatures named Akron Legionnaire and artifact creatures, creatures you control can't attack.

card.name: Al-abara's Carpet
card.text: {5}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures without flying.

card.name: Alabaster Potion
card.text: Choose one - Target player gains X life; or prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Alchor's Tomb
card.text: {2}, {T}: Target permanent you control becomes the color of your choice.

card.name: All Hallow's Eve
card.text: Exile All Hallow's Eve with two scream counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if All Hallow's Eve is exiled with a scream counter on it, remove a scream counter from it. If there are no more scream counters on it, put it into your graveyard and each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Amrou Kithkin
card.text: Amrou Kithkin can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.

card.name: Angelic Voices
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control no nonartifact, nonwhite creatures.

card.name: Angus Mackenzie
card.text: {G}{W}{U}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Activate this ability only before the combat damage step.

card.name: Anti-Magic Aura
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells and can't be enchanted by other Auras.

card.name: Arboria
card.text: Creatures can't attack a player unless that player cast a spell or put a nontoken permanent onto the battlefield during his or her last turn.

card.name: Arcades Sabboth
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Arcades Sabboth unless you pay {G}{W}{U}. Each untapped creature you control gets +0/+2 as long as it's not attacking. {W}: Arcades Sabboth gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Arena of the Ancients
card.text: Legendary creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. When Arena of the Ancients enters the battlefield, tap all legendary creatures.

card.name: Avoid Fate
card.text: Counter target instant or Aura spell that targets a permanent you control.

card.name: Axelrod Gunnarson
card.text: Trample Whenever a creature dealt damage by Axelrod Gunnarson this turn dies, you gain 1 life and Axelrod deals 1 damage to target player.

card.name: Ayesha Tanaka
card.text: Banding {T}: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source unless that ability's controller pays {W}.

card.name: Backdraft
card.text: Choose a player who cast one or more sorcery spells this turn. Backdraft deals damage to that player equal to half the damage dealt by one of those sorcery spells this turn, rounded down.

card.name: Backfire
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to you, Backfire deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Bartel Runeaxe
card.text: Vigilance Bartel Runeaxe can't be the target of Aura spells.

card.name: Beasts of Bogardan
card.text: Protection from red Beasts of Bogardan gets +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls a white permanent.

card.name: Black Mana Battery
card.text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Black Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Black Mana Battery: Add {B} to your mana pool, then add an additional {B} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Blazing Effigy
card.text: When Blazing Effigy dies, it deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the amount of damage dealt to Blazing Effigy this turn by other sources named Blazing Effigy.

card.name: Blight
card.text: Enchant land When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.

card.name: Blood Lust
card.text: If target creature has toughness 5 or greater, it gets +4/-4 until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +4/-X until end of turn, where X is its toughness minus 1.

card.name: Blue Mana Battery
card.text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Blue Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Blue Mana Battery: Add {U} to your mana pool, then add an additional {U} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Boomerang
card.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Boris Devilboon
card.text: {2}{B}{R}, {T}: Put a 1/1 black and red Demon creature token named Minor Demon onto the battlefield.

card.name: Brine Hag
card.text: When Brine Hag dies, all creatures that dealt damage to it this turn become 0/2.

card.name: Bronze Horse
card.text: Trample As long as you control another creature, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Bronze Horse by spells that target it.

card.name: Carrion Ants
card.text: {1}: Carrion Ants gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Cathedral of Serra
card.text: White legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures."

card.name: Caverns of Despair
card.text: No more than two creatures can attack each combat. No more than two creatures can block each combat.

card.name: Chain Lightning
card.text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

card.name: Chains of Mephistopheles
card.text: If a player would draw a card except the first one he or she draws in his or her draw step each turn, that player discards a card instead. If the player discards a card this way, he or she draws a card. If the player doesn't discard a card this way, he or she puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Chromium
card.text: Flying Rampage 2 At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Chromium unless you pay {W}{U}{B}.

card.name: Cleanse
card.text: Destroy all black creatures.

card.name: Clergy of the Holy Nimbus
card.text: If Clergy of the Holy Nimbus would be destroyed, regenerate it. {1}: Clergy of the Holy Nimbus can't be regenerated this turn. Only any opponent may activate this ability.

card.name: Cocoon
card.text: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature doesn't untap during your untap step if Cocoon has a pupa counter on it. When Cocoon enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and put three pupa counters on Cocoon. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a pupa counter from Cocoon. If you can't, sacrifice it, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature, and that creature gains flying.

card.name: Concordant Crossroads
card.text: All creatures have haste.

card.name: Cosmic Horror
card.text: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy Cosmic Horror unless you pay {3}{B}{B}{B}. If Cosmic Horror is destroyed this way, it deals 7 damage to you.

card.name: Craw Giant
card.text: Trample Rampage 2

card.name: Crevasse
card.text: Creatures with mountainwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have mountainwalk.

card.name: Crimson Manticore
card.text: Flying {R}, {T}: Crimson Manticore deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Cyclopean Mummy
card.text: When Cyclopean Mummy dies, exile it.

card.name: Dakkon Blackblade
card.text: Dakkon Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

card.name: Darkness
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: D'Avenant Archer
card.text: {T}: D'Avenant Archer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Deadfall
card.text: Creatures with forestwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have forestwalk.

card.name: Demonic Torment
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

card.name: Disharmony
card.text: Cast Disharmony only during combat before blockers are declared. Untap target attacking creature and remove it from combat. Gain control of that creature until end of turn.

card.name: Divine Intervention
card.text: Divine Intervention enters the battlefield with two intervention counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an intervention counter from Divine Intervention. When you remove the last intervention counter from Divine Intervention, the game is a draw.

card.name: Divine Offering
card.text: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Divine Transformation
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

card.name: Dream Coat
card.text: Enchant creature {0}: Enchanted creature becomes the color or colors of your choice. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Dwarven Song
card.text: Any number of target creatures become red until end of turn.

card.name: Elder Land Wurm
card.text: Defender, trample When Elder Land Wurm blocks, it loses defender.

card.name: Elder Spawn
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, unless you sacrifice an Island, sacrifice Elder Spawn and it deals 6 damage to you. Elder Spawn can't be blocked by red creatures.

card.name: Elven Riders
card.text: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.

card.name: Emerald Dragonfly
card.text: Flying {G}{G}: Emerald Dragonfly gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Enchanted Being
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Enchanted Being by enchanted creatures.

card.name: Enchantment Alteration
card.text: Attach target Aura attached to a creature or land to another permanent of that type.

card.name: Energy Tap
card.text: Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, add an amount of {C} to your mana pool equal to that creature's converted mana cost.

card.name: Equinox
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Counter target spell if it would destroy a land you control."

card.name: Eternal Warrior
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has vigilance.

card.name: Eureka
card.text: Starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from his or her hand onto the battlefield. Repeat this process until no one puts a card onto the battlefield.

card.name: Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore
card.text: Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack. Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore can't be blocked except by Walls.

card.name: Fallen Angel
card.text: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Falling Star
card.text: Flip Falling Star onto the playing area from a height of at least one foot. Falling Star deals 3 damage to each creature it lands on. Tap all creatures dealt damage by Falling Star. If Falling Star doesn't turn completely over at least once during the flip, it has no effect.

card.name: Feint
card.text: Tap all creatures blocking target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by that creature and each creature blocking it.

card.name: Field of Dreams
card.text: Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.

card.name: Fire Sprites
card.text: Flying {G}, {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Firestorm Phoenix
card.text: Flying If Firestorm Phoenix would die, return Firestorm Phoenix to its owner's hand instead. Until that player's next turn, that player plays with that card revealed in his or her hand and can't play it.

card.name: Flash Counter
card.text: Counter target instant spell.

card.name: Flash Flood
card.text: Choose one - Destroy target red permanent; or return target Mountain to its owner's hand.

card.name: Floral Spuzzem
card.text: Whenever Floral Spuzzem attacks and isn't blocked, you may destroy target artifact defending player controls. If you do, Floral Spuzzem assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Force Spike
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Forethought Amulet
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Forethought Amulet unless you pay {3}. If an instant or sorcery source would deal 3 or more damage to you, it deals 2 damage to you instead.

card.name: Fortified Area
card.text: Wall creatures you control get +1/+0 and have banding.

card.name: Frost Giant
card.text: Rampage 2

card.name: Gabriel Angelfire
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose flying, first strike, trample, or rampage 3. Gabriel Angelfire gains that ability until your next upkeep.

card.name: Gaseous Form
card.text: Enchant creature Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

card.name: Gauntlets of Chaos
card.text: {5}, Sacrifice Gauntlets of Chaos: Exchange control of target artifact, creature, or land you control and target permanent an opponent controls that shares one of those types with it. If those permanents are exchanged this way, destroy all Auras attached to them.

card.name: Ghosts of the Damned
card.text: {T}: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Giant Slug
card.text: {5}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, choose a basic land type. Giant Slug gains landwalk of the chosen type until the end of that turn.

card.name: Giant Strength
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

card.name: Giant Turtle
card.text: Giant Turtle can't attack if it attacked during your last turn.

card.name: Glyph of Delusion
card.text: Put X glyph counters on target creature that target Wall blocked this turn, where X is the power of that blocked creature. The creature gains "This creature doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a glyph counter on it" and "At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a glyph counter from this creature."

card.name: Glyph of Destruction
card.text: Target blocking Wall you control gets +10/+0 until end of combat. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Glyph of Doom
card.text: Choose target Wall creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that were blocked by that creature this turn.

card.name: Glyph of Life
card.text: Choose target Wall creature. Whenever that creature is dealt damage by an attacking creature this turn, you gain that much life.

card.name: Glyph of Reincarnation
card.text: Cast Glyph of Reincarnation only after combat. Destroy all creatures that were blocked by target Wall this turn. They can't be regenerated. For each creature that died this way, put a creature card from the graveyard of the player who controlled that creature the last time it became blocked by that Wall onto the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Gosta Dirk
card.text: First strike Creatures with islandwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have islandwalk.

card.name: Gravity Sphere
card.text: All creatures lose flying.

card.name: Great Defender
card.text: Target creature gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is its converted mana cost.

card.name: Great Wall
card.text: Creatures with plainswalk can be blocked as though they didn't have plainswalk.

card.name: Greater Realm of Preservation
card.text: {1}{W}: The next time a black or red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Greed
card.text: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

card.name: Green Mana Battery
card.text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Green Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Green Mana Battery: Add {G} to your mana pool, then add an additional {G} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Gwendlyn Di Corci
card.text: {T}: Target player discards a card at random. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: Halfdane
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Halfdane's power and toughness become equal to the power and toughness of target creature other than Halfdane until the end of your next upkeep.

card.name: Hammerheim
card.text: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {T}: Target creature loses all landwalk abilities until end of turn.

card.name: Hazezon Tamar
card.text: When Hazezon Tamar enters the battlefield, put X 1/1 Sand Warrior creature tokens that are red, green, and white onto the battlefield at the beginning of your next upkeep, where X is the number of lands you control at that time. When Hazezon leaves the battlefield, exile all Sand Warriors.

card.name: Heaven's Gate
card.text: Any number of target creatures become white until end of turn.

card.name: Hell Swarm
card.text: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Hellfire
card.text: Destroy all nonblack creatures. Hellfire deals X plus 3 damage to you, where X is the number of creatures that died this way.

card.name: Hell's Caretaker
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Holy Day
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Horn of Deafening
card.text: {2}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.

card.name: Hornet Cobra
card.text: First strike

card.name: Horror of Horrors
card.text: Sacrifice a Swamp: Regenerate target black creature.

card.name: Hunding Gjornersen
card.text: Rampage 1

card.name: Hyperion Blacksmith
card.text: {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact an opponent controls.

card.name: Ichneumon Druid
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts an instant spell other than the first instant spell that player casts each turn, Ichneumon Druid deals 4 damage to him or her.

card.name: Immolation
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/-2.

card.name: Imprison
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever a player activates an ability of enchanted creature with {T} in its activation cost that isn't a mana ability, you may pay {1}. If you do, counter that ability. If you don't, destroy Imprison. Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, you may pay {1}. If you do, tap the creature, remove it from combat, and creatures it was blocking that had become blocked by only that creature this combat become unblocked. If you don't, destroy Imprison.

card.name: In the Eye of Chaos
card.text: Whenever a player casts an instant spell, counter it unless that player pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.

card.name: Indestructible Aura
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Infernal Medusa
card.text: Whenever Infernal Medusa blocks a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat. Whenever Infernal Medusa becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Infinite Authority
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with toughness 3 or less, destroy the other creature at end of combat. At the beginning of the next end step, if that creature was destroyed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on the first creature.

card.name: Invoke Prejudice
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell that doesn't share a color with a creature you control, counter that spell unless that player pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.

card.name: Ivory Guardians
card.text: Protection from red Creatures named Ivory Guardians get +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls a nontoken red permanent.

card.name: Jacques le Vert
card.text: Green creatures you control get +0/+2.

card.name: Johan
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Johan gain "Johan can't attack" until end of combat. If you do, attacking doesn't cause creatures you control to tap this combat if Johan is untapped.

card.name: Jovial Evil
card.text: Jovial Evil deals X damage to target opponent, where X is twice the number of white creatures that player controls.

card.name: Juxtapose
card.text: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the highest converted mana cost. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for highest cost, their controller chooses one of them.

card.name: Karakas
card.text: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {T}: Return target legendary creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Kei Takahashi
card.text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Killer Bees
card.text: Flying {G}: Killer Bees gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Kismet
card.text: Artifacts, creatures, and lands played by your opponents enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Knowledge Vault
card.text: {2}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library face down. {0}: Sacrifice Knowledge Vault. If you do, discard your hand, then put all cards exiled with Knowledge Vault into their owner's hand. When Knowledge Vault leaves the battlefield, put all cards exiled with Knowledge Vault into their owner's graveyard.

card.name: Kobold Drill Sergeant
card.text: Other Kobold creatures you control get +0/+1 and have trample.

card.name: Kobold Overlord
card.text: First strike Other Kobold creatures you control have first strike.

card.name: Kobold Taskmaster
card.text: Other Kobold creatures you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Kry Shield
card.text: {2}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by target creature you control. That creature gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is its converted mana cost.

card.name: Lady Caleria
card.text: {T}: Lady Caleria deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Lady Evangela
card.text: {W}{B}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.

card.name: Land Equilibrium
card.text: If an opponent who controls at least as many lands as you do would put a land onto the battlefield, that player instead puts that land onto the battlefield then sacrifices a land.

card.name: Land Tax
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Land's Edge
card.text: Discard a card: If the discarded card is a land card, Land's Edge deals 2 damage to target player. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Lesser Werewolf
card.text: {B}: If Lesser Werewolf's power is 1 or more, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn and put a -0/-1 counter on target creature blocking or blocked by Lesser Werewolf. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

card.name: Life Chisel
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Life Matrix
card.text: {4}, {T}: Put a matrix counter on target creature and that creature gains "Remove a matrix counter from this creature: Regenerate this creature." Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Lifeblood
card.text: Whenever a Mountain an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Living Plane
card.text: All lands are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

card.name: Livonya Silone
card.text: First strike, legendary landwalk

card.name: Lord Magnus
card.text: First strike Creatures with plainswalk can be blocked as though they didn't have plainswalk. Creatures with forestwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have forestwalk.

card.name: Mana Drain
card.text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} to your mana pool equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Mana Matrix
card.text: Instant and enchantment spells you cast cost up to {2} less to cast.

card.name: Marble Priest
card.text: All Walls able to block Marble Priest do so. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Marble Priest by Walls.

card.name: Marhault Elsdragon
card.text: Rampage 1

card.name: Master of the Hunt
card.text: {2}{G}{G}: Put a 1/1 green Wolf creature token named Wolves of the Hunt onto the battlefield. It has "bands with other creatures named Wolves of the Hunt."

card.name: Mirror Universe
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mirror Universe: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Moat
card.text: Creatures without flying can't attack.

card.name: Mold Demon
card.text: When Mold Demon enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice two Swamps.

card.name: Mountain Stronghold
card.text: Red legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures."

card.name: Mountain Yeti
card.text: Mountainwalk, protection from white

card.name: Nebuchadnezzar
card.text: {X}, {T}: Name a card. Target opponent reveals X cards at random from his or her hand. Then that player discards all cards with that name revealed this way. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: Nether Void
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, counter it unless that player pays {3}.

card.name: Nicol Bolas
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}. Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards his or her hand.

card.name: North Star
card.text: {4}, {T}: For one spell this turn, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to pay that spell's mana cost.

card.name: Nova Pentacle
card.text: {3}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to target creature of an opponent's choice instead.

card.name: Osai Vultures
card.text: Flying At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a carrion counter on Osai Vultures. Remove two carrion counters from Osai Vultures: Osai Vultures gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Palladia-Mors
card.text: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Palladia-Mors unless you pay {R}{G}{W}.

card.name: Part Water
card.text: X target creatures gain islandwalk until end of turn.

card.name: Pavel Maliki
card.text: {B}{R}: Pavel Maliki gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Pendelhaven
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Petra Sphinx
card.text: {T}: Target player names a card, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If that card is the named card, that player puts it into his or her hand. If it isn't, the player puts it into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Pit Scorpion
card.text: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter.

card.name: Pixie Queen
card.text: Flying {G}{G}{G}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Planar Gate
card.text: Creature spells you cast cost up to {2} less to cast.

card.name: Pradesh Gypsies
card.text: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Presence of the Master
card.text: Whenever a player casts an enchantment spell, counter it.

card.name: Primordial Ooze
card.text: Primordial Ooze attacks each turn if able. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Primordial Ooze. Then you may pay {X}, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it. If you don't, tap Primordial Ooze and it deals X damage to you.

card.name: Princess Lucrezia
card.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Psionic Entity
card.text: {T}: Psionic Entity deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to itself.

card.name: Psychic Purge
card.text: Psychic Purge deals 1 damage to target creature or player. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Psychic Purge, that player loses 5 life.

card.name: Puppet Master
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand. If that card is returned to its owner's hand this way, you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, return Puppet Master to its owner's hand.

card.name: Pyrotechnics
card.text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Quagmire
card.text: Creatures with swampwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have swampwalk.

card.name: Quarum Trench Gnomes
card.text: {T}: If target Plains is tapped for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of white mana.

card.name: Rabid Wombat
card.text: Vigilance Rabid Wombat gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.

card.name: Radjan Spirit
card.text: {T}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

card.name: Ragnar
card.text: {G}{W}{U}, {T}: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Ramirez DePietro
card.text: First strike

card.name: Ramses Overdark
card.text: {T}: Destroy target enchanted creature.

card.name: Rapid Fire
card.text: Cast Rapid Fire only before blockers are declared. Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. If it doesn't have rampage, that creature gains rampage 2 until end of turn.

card.name: Rasputin Dreamweaver
card.text: Rasputin Dreamweaver enters the battlefield with seven dream counters on it. Remove a dream counter from Rasputin: Add {C} to your mana pool. Remove a dream counter from Rasputin: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Rasputin this turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Rasputin started the turn untapped, put a dream counter on it. Rasputin can't have more than seven dream counters on it.

card.name: Rebirth
card.text: Remove Rebirth from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. Each player may put the top card of his or her library into the ante. If a player does, his or her life total becomes 20.

card.name: Recall
card.text: Discard X cards, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand for each card discarded this way. Exile Recall.

card.name: Red Mana Battery
card.text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Red Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Red Mana Battery: Add {R} to your mana pool, then add an additional {R} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Reincarnation
card.text: Choose target creature. When that creature dies this turn, return a creature card from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield under the control of that creature's owner.

card.name: Relic Barrier
card.text: {T}: Tap target artifact.

card.name: Relic Bind
card.text: Enchant artifact an opponent controls Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, choose one - Relic Bind deals 1 damage to target player; or target player gains 1 life.

card.name: Remove Enchantments
card.text: Return to your hand all enchantments you both own and control, all Auras you own attached to permanents you control, and all Auras you own attached to attacking creatures your opponents control. Then destroy all other enchantments you control, all other Auras attached to permanents you control, and all other Auras attached to attacking creatures your opponents control.

card.name: Remove Soul
card.text: Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Reset
card.text: Cast Reset only during an opponent's turn after his or her upkeep step. Untap all lands you control.

card.name: Revelation
card.text: Players play with their hands revealed.

card.name: Reverberation
card.text: All damage that would be dealt this turn by target sorcery spell is dealt to that spell's controller instead.

card.name: Ring of Immortals
card.text: {3}, {T}: Counter target instant or Aura spell that targets a permanent you control.

card.name: Riven Turnbull
card.text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Rohgahh of Kher Keep
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {R}{R}{R}. If you don't, tap Rohgahh of Kher Keep and all creatures named Kobolds of Kher Keep, then an opponent gains control of them. Creatures you control named Kobolds of Kher Keep get +2/+2.

card.name: Rubinia Soulsinger
card.text: You may choose not to untap Rubinia Soulsinger during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Rubinia and Rubinia remains tapped.

card.name: Rust
card.text: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source.

card.name: Sea Kings' Blessing
card.text: Any number of target creatures become blue until end of turn.

card.name: Seafarer's Quay
card.text: Blue legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures."

card.name: Seeker
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or white creatures.

card.name: Sentinel
card.text: {0}: Sentinel's toughness becomes 1 plus the power of target creature blocking or blocked by Sentinel.

card.name: Serpent Generator
card.text: {4}, {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Snake artifact creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter."

card.name: Shelkin Brownie
card.text: {T}: Target creature loses all "bands with other" abilities until end of turn.

card.name: Shield Wall
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Shimian Night Stalker
card.text: {B}, {T}: All damage that would be dealt to you this turn by target attacking creature is dealt to Shimian Night Stalker instead.

card.name: Silhouette
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by spells or abilities that target it.

card.name: Sol'kanar the Swamp King
card.text: Swampwalk Whenever a player casts a black spell, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Spectral Cloak
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has shroud as long as it's untapped.

card.name: Spinal Villain
card.text: {T}: Destroy target blue creature.

card.name: Spirit Link
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Spirit Shackle
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, put a -0/-2 counter on it.

card.name: Spiritual Sanctuary
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls a Plains, he or she gains 1 life.

card.name: Stangg
card.text: When Stangg enters the battlefield, put a legendary 3/4 red and green Human Warrior creature token named Stangg Twin onto the battlefield. When Stangg leaves the battlefield, exile that token. When that token leaves the battlefield, sacrifice Stangg.

card.name: Storm Seeker
card.text: Storm Seeker deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

card.name: Storm World
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Storm World deals X damage to that player, where X is 4 minus the number of cards in his or her hand.

card.name: Subdue
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn. That creature gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is its converted mana cost.

card.name: Sunastian Falconer
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Sword of the Ages
card.text: Sword of the Ages enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Sword of the Ages and any number of creatures you control: Sword of the Ages deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the total power of the creatures sacrificed this way, then exile Sword of the Ages and those creature cards.

card.name: Sylvan Library
card.text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

card.name: Sylvan Paradise
card.text: Any number of target creatures become green until end of turn.

card.name: Syphon Soul
card.text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

card.name: Takklemaggot
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature. When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller chooses a creature that Takklemaggot could enchant. If he or she does, return Takklemaggot to the battlefield under your control attached to that creature. If he or she doesn't, return Takklemaggot to the battlefield under your control as a non-Aura enchantment. It loses "enchant creature" and gains "At the beginning of that player's upkeep, Takklemaggot deals 1 damage to him or her."

card.name: Telekinesis
card.text: Tap target creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by that creature this turn. It doesn't untap during its controller's next two untap steps.

card.name: Teleport
card.text: Cast Teleport only during the declare attackers step. Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Tempest Efreet
card.text: Remove Tempest Efreet from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. {T}, Sacrifice Tempest Efreet: Target opponent may pay 10 life. If that player doesn't, he or she reveals a card at random from his or her hand. Exchange ownership of the revealed card and Tempest Efreet. Put the revealed card into your hand and Tempest Efreet from anywhere into that player's graveyard.

card.name: Tetsuo Umezawa
card.text: Tetsuo Umezawa can't be the target of Aura spells. {U}{B}{B}{R}, {T}: Destroy target tapped or blocking creature.

card.name: The Abyss
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of his or her choice. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: The Brute
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0. {R}{R}{R}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale
card.text: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature unless you pay {1}."

card.name: The Wretched
card.text: At end of combat, gain control of all creatures blocking The Wretched for as long as you control The Wretched.

card.name: Thunder Spirit
card.text: Flying, first strike

card.name: Time Elemental
card.text: When Time Elemental attacks or blocks, at end of combat, sacrifice it and it deals 5 damage to you. {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent that isn't enchanted to its owner's hand.

card.name: Tolaria
card.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {T}: Target creature loses banding and all "bands with other" abilities until end of turn. Activate this ability only during any upkeep step.

card.name: Tor Wauki
card.text: {T}: Tor Wauki deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Touch of Darkness
card.text: Any number of target creatures become black until end of turn.

card.name: Transmutation
card.text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Triassic Egg
card.text: {3}, {T}: Put a hatchling counter on Triassic Egg. Sacrifice Triassic Egg: Choose one - You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield; or return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only if two or more hatchling counters are on Triassic Egg.

card.name: Tuknir Deathlock
card.text: Flying {R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Tundra Wolves
card.text: First strike

card.name: Typhoon
card.text: Typhoon deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of Islands that player controls.

card.name: Undertow
card.text: Creatures with islandwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have islandwalk.

card.name: Underworld Dreams
card.text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to him or her.

card.name: Unholy Citadel
card.text: Black legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures."

card.name: Untamed Wilds
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Urborg
card.text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {T}: Target creature loses first strike or swampwalk until end of turn.

card.name: Ur-Drago
card.text: First strike Creatures with swampwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have swampwalk.

card.name: Vaevictis Asmadi
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Vaevictis Asmadi unless you pay {B}{R}{G}. {B}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {G}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Vampire Bats
card.text: Flying {B}: Vampire Bats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.

card.name: Venarian Gold
card.text: Enchant creature When Venarian Gold enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and put a number of sleep counters on it equal to the value of X as you cast Venarian Gold. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step if it has a sleep counter on it. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, remove a sleep counter from that creature.

card.name: Visions
card.text: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. You may then have that player shuffle that library.

card.name: Voodoo Doll
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a pin counter on Voodoo Doll. At the beginning of your end step, if Voodoo Doll is untapped, destroy Voodoo Doll and it deals damage to you equal to the number of pin counters on it. {X}{X}, {T}: Voodoo Doll deals damage equal to the number of pin counters on it to target creature or player. X is the number of pin counters on Voodoo Doll.

card.name: Walking Dead
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Walking Dead.

card.name: Wall of Caltrops
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Caltrops blocks a creature, if at least one other Wall creature is blocking that creature and no non-Wall creatures are blocking that creature, Wall of Caltrops gains banding until end of turn.

card.name: Wall of Dust
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Dust blocks a creature, that creature can't attack during its controller's next turn.

card.name: Wall of Light
card.text: Defender Protection from black

card.name: Wall of Opposition
card.text: Defender {1}: Wall of Opposition gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wall of Putrid Flesh
card.text: Defender Protection from white Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Putrid Flesh by enchanted creatures.

card.name: Wall of Shadows
card.text: Defender Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Shadows by creatures it's blocking. Wall of Shadows can't be the target of spells that can target only Walls or of abilities that can target only Walls.

card.name: Wall of Tombstones
card.text: Defender At the beginning of your upkeep, Wall of Tombstones's toughness becomes 1 plus the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Wall of Vapor
card.text: Defender Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Vapor by creatures it's blocking.

card.name: Wall of Wonder
card.text: Defender {2}{U}{U}: Wall of Wonder gets +4/-4 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Whirling Dervish
card.text: Protection from black At the beginning of each end step, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: White Mana Battery
card.text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on White Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from White Mana Battery: Add {W} to your mana pool, then add an additional {W} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Willow Satyr
card.text: You may choose not to untap Willow Satyr during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target legendary creature for as long as you control Willow Satyr and Willow Satyr remains tapped.

card.name: Winds of Change
card.text: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Winter Blast
card.text: Tap X target creatures. Winter Blast deals 2 damage to each of those creatures with flying.

card.name: Wolverine Pack
card.text: Rampage 2

card.name: Wood Elemental
card.text: As Wood Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of untapped Forests. Wood Elemental's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests sacrificed as it entered the battlefield.

card.name: Xira Arien
card.text: Flying {B}{R}{G}, {T}: Target player draws a card.

card.name: Zephyr Falcon
card.text: Flying, vigilance
